name: Self Tanning Lotion, Tube Squeezer Reusable for Easy Use, Body Hydrating Self Tanning Cream, Streak-Free, Fake Tan & Quick Tan for Natural-Looking Bronzer Glow for Women & Men
about_this_item: Embrace Your Glow in Two Shades: Choose between medium and dark tones to achieve a fake tan on your body that complements your natural skin color. Equipped with a reusable tube squeezer for efficient use and minimal product waste

Nature-Inspired Radiance: Our self-tanner lotion for body delivers more than just a fake tan. Infused with organic aloe vera, shea butter, and a select blend of plant extracts, it promotes a sun-kissed glow while providing hydration benefits
Skin-Friendly Formulation: Crafted with a lightweight, non-greasy, and fragrance-free blend that's gentle on the body. This self-tanner is free from harmful additives or dyes

Smooth and Streak-Free Application: Our fast-absorbing self-tanning lotion is smooth and gentle, ensuring a seamless experience. With careful usage, it won't stain your sheets or clothes, promising a hassle-free tanning experience

Sustain Your Sun-Kissed Look: Enjoy a lasting tan for several days with our sunless tanning lotion. With adequate care, you can maintain your beautiful glow without the need for traditional sun exposure
